{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.escrow}} {{accountDetailsData.accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.escrowDueAmount | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.mortgageInsurance}} {{accountDetailsData.accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.mortgageInsuranceDueAmount | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.subTotal}} {{accountDetailsData.accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.principalAndInterestDueAmount + accountDetailsData.accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.escrowDueAmount + accountDetailsData.accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.mortgageInsuranceDueAmount | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.pastDue}} {{accountDetailsData.accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountBalanceInfo.pastDueAmount | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.lateFees}} {{accountDetailsData.accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountBalanceInfo.lateChargeBalance | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.unappliedFunds}} {{-accountDetailsData.accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountBalanceInfo.suspenseBalance | currency}}

{{accountDetailsData.accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.totalPaymentDueAmount | currency}}
